paras: Our loyalty card, the Cuplux Bloc Card, is built for customers that love our coffee and want to support our community philosophy. Itâ€™s a very simple program: You get 10% back on all purchases of food or drink at Cuplux to use on a future visit to our shop. To obtain the card there is a $5.00 annual membership fee which goes to funding urban conservation efforts in and around the community that surrounds our shop. The best part is, use the balance whenever you please!
